param.name: show_searchphrase
param.label: Word Combination
param.description: Allow users to select method of combining the search words, e.g. any, all, exact phrase

param.name: default_searchphrase
param.label: Default combination
param.description: Default (preselected) method of combining the search words

param.name: minchars
param.label: Word Min Length
param.description: Minimum character length that search words are allowed to have

param.name: maxchars
param.label: Word Max Length
param.description: Maximum characters length that search words are allowed to have

param.name: limit_override
param.label: Limit Selector
param.description: Display frontend selection to allow to override default setting

param.name: orderby_override
param.label: Ordering Selector
param.description: Display frontend selection to allow to override default setting

param.name: autodisplayadvoptions
param.label: Advanced Search Box
param.description: If this is disabled. Then a clickable text will appear to allow user to toggle the advanced search box on/off.

param.name: show_filtersop
param.label: Filters Combination
param.description: Allow users to select method of combining the search filters, e.g. any filter, all filters

param.name: default_filtersop
param.label: Default combination
param.description: Default (preselected) method of combining the search filters

param.name: advsearch_fieldlist
param.label: Add Filter (below)
param.description: Please select one by one fields to add to textarea below.

param.name: search_fields
param.label: Field (Attribute) Filters
param.description: Enter Content Attibute Filters (their fieldnames) used to limit the text search result list, these will be included in the search form, and will appear inside advanced search options box. You can separate each fieldname by comma(,). NOTE that fields not marked as Search View Indexable (=Searchable) will be skipped even if you add them here
Optional selection parameters like content types and Other Search Areas of Site (non FC Content Data)

param.name: cantypes
param.label: Show selection
param.description: Allow users to select content types they want to include in their search

param.name: contenttypes
param.label: Searchable Types
param.description: The content types the search will include, selecting none will include ALL. NOTE: You can allow user to select Content Types. If you do then the selection list will be LIMITED to display ONLY the types specified here

param.name: show_searchareas
param.label: Show selection
param.description: Allow the user to select and search other areas of the website content, e.g. like weblinks, user contacts, etc

param.name: searchareas
param.label: Search Areas
param.description: The site's (non-FC content) search areas, that the search will include. NOTE: if user is allowed to select Search Areas, then the selection list will be LIMITED to display ONLY the search areas selected here

param.name: show_searchordering
param.label: Show ordering
param.description: Allow frontend users to select ordering of results of other areas of the website content. NOTE this is different ordering from the ordering used for main content results.

param.name: default_searchordering
param.label: Default value
param.description: Default ordering for sorting the results of the search

param.name: show_section
param.label: Show section
param.description: Display section for each result. Note, this usually should be disabled since all FLEXIcontent items are placed in a single section

param.name: show_text
param.label: Show matching information
param.description: Display for each result its matching information, showing what words or filters were matched during search

param.name: show_date
param.label: Show creation date
param.description: Display for each result its creation date
